dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4252926Z] Stolen software at topdownloads.net...
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, May 25, 2007 9:14 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4252926Z] Stolen software at
topdownloads.net...

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Stolen software at topdownloads.net...

From: "Slava V.Lyushnya" <slava@softdeluxe.com>

Subject: Stolen software at topdownloads.net...

        format=flowed;

X-MIMEOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028

TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED  
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 24 May 2007 16:44:06.0294 (UTC)
FILETIME=[BE592B60:01C79E22] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Hello guys, 
My name is Slava and I work for Softdeluxe, the company that owns and
runs  
Giveawayoftheday.com website which is well known enough for some people
to  
steal software we present for free.... 
Please take a look at http://www.topdownloads.net/, these guys present
our  
giveaways in unlimited versions (seems that they removed our protection)
as  
a free downloads. They have no authorization from software vendors to do

that, and, of course, no authorization from us, that's just a pure
software  
piracy. 
For example, they have 7Lands game with our branding inside for download

today... 
I hope you have some sort of shutdown rules for websites that provide  
pirated downloads... 
 
Let me know if you need more information from me, I would be glad to
help  
you with stopping this piracy... 
 
Yours, 
Slava 
Softdeluxe/GAOTD
